interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: LUMINESS Silk Airbrush Spray Foundation - Full Coverage Foundation - Formula Hydrates & Moisturizes with Hyaluronic Acid, Aloe Vera & Hydrolyzed Silk (Shade - Tan) Review Date: 2022/11/15 Store: LUMINESS Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Color': 'Tan - 100', 'Finish Type': 'Satin', 'Package Information': 'Bottle', 'Brand': 'LUMINESS', 'Coverage': 'Full', 'UPC': '841249121725'} Review Text: When I ordered this there were only two shade choices, fair light and medium. I am a light neutral usually so I chose fair light. It is too light for me but not so light that I can't make it work with bronzer. The instructions say to spray it on their brush then apply it. I wanted to spray it directly on my face so I did and it is the most immediate full coverage application I've ever had. You do need to be careful because you could end up with it in your hair and whatnot. I also sprayed it on my sponge and applied it like that. It worked fine that way but it wasn't as full coverage.
This takes a while to dry down and if you're like me and don't set your face this could be a problem when you're applying the rest of your makeup. I did feel like my contour and bronzer was removing the foundation somewhat. Once it dried down completely though it stayed. The finish seemed more matte to me than satin but I have dry skin so that could be why. I think this is a really nice foundation but it takes some work. Also I seriously hope they do something about the shade range. Review Title: Very full coverage Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Baoyuan Makeup Brushes Color Removal Sponge and Mat Kit Baoyuan {'Package Dimensions': '6.61 x 5.55 x 1.69 inches; 2.54 Ounces', 'UPC': '703681245158'} This thing does exactly what it says. Its actually made me kind of lazy cleaning my brushes because it does such a great job getting all the makeup off. The little silicone brush thingy is pretty useful. It definitely helps me get my brushes clean faster. It works Salux Nylon Japanese Beauty Skin Bath Wash Cloth/Towel - White2PACK SALUX ['Beauty Skin Cloth is great for your skin. Use less soap and create more later This wash cloth is designed to stimulate your skin and help blood circulate leaving your skin feeling refreshed and smooth. It is excellent for massage.'] {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '34.65 x 34.65 x 0.04 inches; 2.88 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'AW00312PCK', 'UPC': '614409722533'} These are amazing! Even my husband loves them and I can never get him to exfoliate. It feels so great to wash with this. If you like body scrubs i highly recommend try this because it is so much better. Exfoliate everywhere! essence | Welcome to London Eyeshadow Palette | 12 Highly Pigmented, Matte & Metallic Blendable Shades | Vegan & Cruelty Free | Free From Oil, Fragrance, Parabens, Alcohol, & Microplastic Particles essence cosmetics {'Brand': 'Essence cosmetics', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Metallic, Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '6.73 x 2.52 x 0.47 inches; 0.46 Ounces', 'Item model number': '934871', 'Manufacturer': 'Cosnova'} This is my first time using essence eyeshadow and it will definitely not be my last. I never really use drug store eyeshadow and to be honest I don't think I have any in my collection. But if this is the quality I can expect then that is about to change. I'm so impressed with the performance of these shadows! Most of the shades are buttery smooth and pigmented. The mattes blend out so easily and I didn't get any patchiness. You do have to build these up but that is not necessarily a bad thing. There was quite a bit of kick up in the pan but I didn't get any fallout at all. This color story is beautiful and even if you aren't a fan of colorful eyeshadow there's still lots to work with. I am very much looking forward to trying more palettes from this brand. I'm impressed! seedling Heated Eye Mask for Dry Eyes, Eye Compress Moist Heat, Silk sleep mask for dry eye relief, Plant Extract Warm Compress for Eyes, Stye Eye Therapy Mask (Blue) Seedling {'Brand': 'Seedling', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '9.2 x 4.2 x 0.6 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '9.2 x 4.2 x 0.6 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'M', 'Manufacturer': 'seedling', 'Country of Origin': 'China'} [[VIDEOID:36d4410bf57b9b8fc73b6e62a0e7688b]] I've been dealing with dry eyes for a couple years now and I wear contacts so it can get pretty uncomfortable. When I saw that these masks can help with dry eyes I had to give it a try. This has quickly become my favorite part of my nighttime routine. It is so relaxing I think I could sleep with it on. I do wish it got a bit hotter but I guess they don't want you to burn your eyes. Love this! Baboo Kids Bamboo Toothbrush Soft Bristles - BPA Free Activated Charcoal - Organic Wooden Baby Tooth Brush - Eco-Friendly Biodegradable Toothbrushes for Toddlers, Child and Babies BABOO {'Brand': 'BABOO', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Kid', 'Special Feature': 'Charcoal Infused Bristle', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Item Firmness Description': 'Ultra Soft', 'Product Dimensions': '5.12 x 0.44 x 0.44 inches; 0.42 Ounces', 'UPC': '869003000444', 'Material Feature': 'Biodegradable Warning', 'Manufacturer': 'Baboo'} This is the cutest little toothbrush. It's a little less than 6" long. It's the perfect size for small hands. The bristles are super soft so it won't be too rough on the kiddos. I like that they're black, I've never seen that before. The bamboo feels smooth and I'm not seeing any splintering so far. Perfect for little hands Vitamasques Multivitamin Sleeping Mask Made with Essential Vitamins & Multi-Molecular Hyaluronic Acid for Healthy, Nourished & Hydrated Skin - Vegan, Free from Parabens & Gluten Vitamasques {'Brand': 'Vitamasques', 'Scent': 'Hyaluronic Acid', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '5.98 x 2.36 x 1.57 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'UPC': '750258970081'} [[VIDEOID:890fbc174078c15263a7f9bc618c3905]] I've tried several things from this brand and so far this one is my favorite. I'm surprised because I didn't expect to like it but I really enjoy it. I've been using it after Thierry night cream. It is really wet when you put it on. The little colored balls rub into your skin when you're applying. It dries down and soaks into my skin so fast. Plus it smells really good. I love that it's a sleeping mask and you don't have to wash it off. I've got dry skin and the night cream alone wasn't enough moisture for me but adding this on top is so much better. Love this Tropic Labs Washed Up All-In-One Shower Oil | Gentle Cleansing Body Wash, Bath Oil, & Shaving Oil | Sulfate-Free Body Oil Wash | Skin Moisturizing Body Rinse | Lightweight, Vegan & Cruelty-Free (TSA Friendly) Tropic Labs {} I love this oil! I've got dry skin pretty much all the time and gets much worse in winter. I've tried other oils but I didn't like the way they made my skin feel afterwards. I hate it when my skin feels sticky and that's usually the way I feel after most oils and even moisturizers. Not this though, it softens and moisturizes in the shower but it doesn't leave any stickiness behind. It does have a scent. I think it smells nice but if you're sensitive to fragrance this could be a problem for you. I really love this product but I do think it's pretty expensive for the amount you get. It's really great even though it's overpriced LUMINESS Silk Airbrush Spray Foundation - Full Coverage Foundation - Formula Hydrates & Moisturizes with Hyaluronic Acid, Aloe Vera & Hydrolyzed Silk (Shade - Tan) LUMINESS {'Color': 'Tan - 100', 'Finish Type': 'Satin', 'Package Information': 'Bottle', 'Brand': 'LUMINESS', 'Coverage': 'Full', 'UPC': '841249121725'} When I ordered this there were only two shade choices, fair light and medium. I am a light neutral usually so I chose fair light. It is too light for me but not so light that I can't make it work with bronzer. The instructions say to spray it on their brush then apply it. I wanted to spray it directly on my face so I did and it is the most immediate full coverage application I've ever had. You do need to be careful because you could end up with it in your hair and whatnot. I also sprayed it on my sponge and applied it like that. It worked fine that way but it wasn't as full coverage.
This takes a while to dry down and if you're like me and don't set your face this could be a problem when you're applying the rest of your makeup. I did feel like my contour and bronzer was removing the foundation somewhat. Once it dried down completely though it stayed. The finish seemed more matte to me than satin but I have dry skin so that could be why. I think this is a really nice foundation but it takes some work. Also I seriously hope they do something about the shade range. Very full coverage
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Preference**: The user maintains a commitment to efficiency and ease in their beauty routines while increasingly valuing advanced products that offer hydration and nourishment. Their recent purchase highlights an appreciation for multifunctional foundations that prioritize full coverage while considering comfort and effectiveness.

- **Performance Appreciation**: High-performing products remain a priority, as evidenced by the user’s interest in foundations that deliver impactful results. Their experience with a new foundation emphasizes a desire for innovative application methods that require careful consideration for optimal results.

- **Practicality**: The user continues to seek practical solutions that simplify their routines and enhance overall care. They value products that seamlessly integrate into their daily regimen, reinforcing the need for multifunctional options that align with their lifestyle.

- **Simplicity**: Their inclination toward straightforward and effective products extends to foundations, emphasizing ease of use combined with satisfactory performance. They remain focused on solutions that address specific skin needs while ensuring a user-friendly application process.

- **Holistic Approach**: The user's ongoing focus on overall health and ethical values drives their thoughtful selection of beauty products. Their choices reflect a commitment to sustainable solutions that cater to both personal and environmental well-being, reinforcing their dedication to innovative, nourishing options.

Overall, the updated profile showcases the user’s continued dedication to high-quality, effective skincare that aligns with their principles of practicality and sustainability while embracing new product formats and functionalities.
